* Add bower package.
* Fixed JSHint warnings.

# v0.2.1 / 2014-11-01

* Add refresh method for element move.

# v0.2.0 / 2014-10-28

* Enhance performance.
* Support overflow div.
* Support display none and show.

* Fixed disappear wrong event name.

# v0.1.1 / 2014-05-02

* Support older version jQuery.
* Add detection when initializing.

# v0.1.0 / 2014-02-04

Initial release
